name: Gold Miner Adventure 2
description:
Gold Miner adventure is a remake of gold miner game by the AsuraGame.
This game has several fun items, entities, power compared to the old game.
Have fun with 3 gamemode which is time, number hook, and against bot.
Contain 60 levels and 3 game world.
Provide 5 upgradeable machines which is stone machine, diamond machines, time machines, strength machines and dynamic machines
Slotmachines bring out the most fun.
